channel.title: 508 trading problem
channel.description:
Coding: Pali Problem: Clicking to follow a player sends a trade request.
Basically the first option when you click a player in my source is to follow them. It was until I added trading which made following a player send a trade request instead of the trade with option. Even after you send a trade request with follow, you still follow the player. So how could I fix this to make the trade with option send the request instead of the follow option? All help appreciated.

item.title: 508 trading problem
item.dc:creator: @kennelz kennelz
item.description:
@kennelz wrote:

Coding: Pali
Problem: Clicking to follow a player sends a trade request.

Basically the first option when you click a player in my source is to follow them. It was until I added trading which made following a player send a trade request instead of the trade with option. Even after you send a trade request with follow, you still follow the player. So how could I fix this to make the trade with option send the request instead of the follow option? All help appreciated.
